member_organisations: We enclose our website link which lists our members in detail, http://acte.be/about-us/act-members.
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Digital economy and society, Sport, Borders and Security
inter_groups: We are following the activities of the Creative Industries Intergroup and the Digital Agenda Intergroup and Sports Intergroup (in relation to Sporting rights).
eu_initiatives:
Our priority issues are:  
- Digital Single Market, 
- Copyright Directive, SatCab regulation 
- regulation of media content (especially Audiovisual Media Services directive),  
- e-privacy,  
- fake news 
- regulation of advertising, 
- E-commerce Directive, 
- EU Data protection.
organisation_name: Association of Commercial Television in Europe (ACT)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: European Platform for Action on Diet, Physical Activity and Health#E00845#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=845#Member#C
membership:
Creative & Media Business Alliance 
European Digital Advertising Alliance 
Ethical Journalism Network 
Creativity Works Alliance 
European Internet Forum
goals__remit:
Our statutory objective is to promote co-operation among our member companies and with other enterprises active in audiovisual media, relating to ethics, the regulatory environment, programming, production and financing. 
 
Inter alia, we facilitate the development of joint positions on matters of common interest vis-à-vis the EU institutions.
